sentences.en: Ask for an extra compensation payment to make up for the stress you have been caused.
sentences.cn: 为补偿你为此承受的压力，你要申请额外的补偿金。

sentences.en: At the moment, the law on compensation is very much a grey area.
sentences.cn: 目前，关于赔偿的法律规定十分不明确。

sentences.en: Compensation could be made by adjustments to taxation.
sentences.cn: 通过调整税收可以作出补偿。

sentences.en: Compensation is available for people who have developed asthma as a direct result of their work.
sentences.cn: 直接因工作原因患上哮喘的人会获得赔偿。

sentences.en: Equal compensation should be given to men and women for equal work.
Haemophiliacs are seeking compensation for being given contaminated blood.
sentences.cn: 血友病患者们因为被输入了受到污染的血液而正在寻求赔偿。

sentences.en: He has dismissed an offer of compensation.
People who are wrongly arrested may be paid compensation .
sentences.cn: 被误抓的人有可能得到补偿费。

sentences.en: She was awarded £5,000 in compensation for unfair dismissal.
sentences.cn: 她获判5,000英镑，作为遭到无理解雇的补偿。

sentences.en: The compensation bill offers the miners or their survivors as much as $100,000 apiece.
sentences.cn: 这笔补偿金能向矿工或遇难矿工的家属每人赔偿100,000美元。

sentences.en: The compensation will be split between 140 claimants.
sentences.cn: 赔偿金将在140名索赔人中分配。

sentences.en: The Court ordered Dr Williams to pay £300 compensation and £100 costs after admitting assault.
sentences.cn: 在承认侵犯他人身体罪后，法庭判令威廉斯医生支付300英镑的赔偿金和100英镑的诉讼费。

sentences.en: The injured party got some compensation.
sentences.cn: 受害人得到了一些赔偿。

sentences.en: The toy glider she left him as a Christmas present was no compensation for her absence.
sentences.cn: 她留给他作为圣诞礼物的玩具滑翔机并不能替代她的存在。

sentences.en: There should be compensation for British farmers hit by the slump in demand.
sentences.cn: 应该给受到需求锐减影响的英国农民提供补偿金。

sentences.en: Workers who have been unfairly dismissed may claim compensation.
sentences.cn: 被无理开除的工人可以要求补偿.

words.tran_cn: 可补偿的；应予以补偿的

trans.tran_cn: 补偿/赔偿金，（对不利局面的）补偿，报酬（雇员获得的金钱和其他福利的总和）
trans.tran_en: money paid to someone because they have suffered injury or loss, or because something they own has been damaged
